name: Untitled Puzzle
description:
A logic puzzle game that requires careful planning to solve. The goal is to activate all the gray runes. Players can activate the gray rune as long as the players have enough moves to do so.

1-shooter would cost 1 move.

2 and 4-shooter would cost 2 moves.

8-shooter would cost 4 moves.

To activate a rune, click the left mouse button twice. To start the rune's power, hold the right mouse button. Let go to release the power.

Carefully choose what runes to activate and the victory shall be yours to claim!

P.S This is just a prototype of the game. I would love it if you guys could give me feedback about how the game feels especially its difficulty.
